data.title: Such Good Fries, and a Good Experience, Too
data.text:
Stopped here for lunch one day while in town with a thousand other folks, for a conference. The place was packed and the staff crazy busy, and yet they continued to be able to be attentive and friendly and kept things moving along without making us feel rushed. 

My friend had chicken tenders basket, which looked amazing and she said it was some of the best tenders she'd ever had. My other friend had a Greek meal, which I have forgotten, as well as the Greek fries, which she LOVED. Awesome fries anyway, but with a little feta cheese and a little Greek dressing and they were amazing. 

I stuck to a plain ol' grilled cheese and fries this particular day, and I have to say, I have zero complaints. It was well cooked, not burned, fries were so tasty, and overall great service too.

data.title: another good  place downtown
data.text: the food is regular diner food but it is very good and the prices are reasonable. The waitresses are friendly and helpful

data.title: Great lunches!
data.text: Great menu, numerous specials, priced fairly and likeable, competent servers. Never disappointing - busy especially w/patrons from downtown offices/courts but you can pre-order via phone or when waiting for a table if need be. Variety of kid pleasing "bazaar" items (near cash register) are for sale to benefit a local charity. Souvlaki, avolegmo (lemon rice) soup and many delish menu items from which to choose. Try their excellent rice pudding! A favorite lunch destination!
